articles.description: New variant of the AnarchyGrabber trojan can steal plain text passwords
articles.content:
Hackers have updated the AnarchyGrabber trojan to a new version which is capable of stealing passwords and user tokens, disabling 2FA and spreading malware to a victim's friends as well.
This is the… [+2611 chars]

articles.description: If you’re looking for something beyond Monopoly and Settlers of Catan, fire up your PC and hit the Epic Games Store — while you still can.

articles.title: Linux chief says he's picking AMD over Intel - TechRadar
articles.description: Ryzen beats out Intel for Linus Torvalds
articles.content:
Linux overseer Linus Torvalds has revealed he has replaced the Intel processor on his PC with the 32-core AMD Ryzen Threadripper 3970x.

articles.title: 20 Years Ago, John Romero's Daikatana Nearly Destroyed Doom's Legacy - PCMag
articles.description: Daikatana should've been a slam dunk, with a superstar lead designer, unlimited budget, and a talented team ready to blow the gaming world away. But internal strife led to a lackluster final product. Here's what happened.
articles.content:

articles.title: 'Transcendentally boring': the joy of job simulation games - The Guardian
